data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
RTF::Parser knows too much about RTF - if you want to do something
    fairly different, it won't let you. RTF::Tokenizer does exactly what
    it says on the tin - it spits out tokens. There is a module (and
    more inside) that helps parse the RTF too if you feel so inclined.
